event.title: extends 235 kilometres (146 mi) north from Highway 11/17

data.event: Armstrong is accessible via Highway 527, which extends 235 kilometres (146 mi) north from Highway 11/17 near Thunder Bay.
Canadian Forces Station Armstrong, located 1.1 miles (1.8 km) east of Armstrong, was closed in 1974.

event.title: Later that year it was bought out

data.event: Later that year it was bought out and turned into a popular gathering area for the town featuring a restaurant and bar, hotel, multiple apartments, and a curling rink.
The area, known as D&L, was closed and abounded in 1993 and remains that way today.
